event.description: Melvin Upton grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Carl Crawford singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Mike Lowell.
Evan Longoria pops out to shortstop Nick Green.
Pat Burrell singles on a fly ball to left fielder Jason Bay. Carl Crawford scores.
Willy Aybar singles on a line drive to left fielder Jason Bay. Pat Burrell to 2nd.
Ben Zobrist called out on strikes.
Akinori Iwamura lines out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Jason Bartlett called out on strikes.
Dioner Navarro grounds out to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Melvin Upton reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Mike Lowell.
With Carl Crawford batting, Melvin Upton caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Jason Varitek to shortstop Nick Green.
Carl Crawford grounds out, pitcher Josh Beckett to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Evan Longoria walks.
Pat Burrell grounds into a force out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to shortstop Nick Green. Evan Longoria out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Julio Lugo replaces second baseman Dustin Pedroia, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive switch from shortstop to second base for Nick Green.
Willy Aybar grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Ben Zobrist grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Akinori Iwamura flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Jason Bartlett strikes out swinging.
Dioner Navarro grounds out softly, pitcher Josh Beckett to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Melvin Upton doubles (5) on a line drive to left fielder Jason Bay.
Carl Crawford singles on a fly ball to right fielder J. D. Drew. Melvin Upton scores.
With Evan Longoria batting, Carl Crawford steals (22) 2nd base.
Evan Longoria grounds out, shortstop Julio Lugo to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Pat Burrell strikes out swinging.
Willy Aybar doubles (4) on a fly ball to shortstop Julio Lugo, deflected by left fielder Jason Bay.
Ben Zobrist walks.
Akinori Iwamura walks. Willy Aybar to 3rd. Ben Zobrist to 2nd.
Jason Bartlett out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder J. D. Drew. Willy Aybar scores. Ben Zobrist to 3rd.
With Dioner Navarro batting, Akinori Iwamura steals (7) 2nd base.
Dioner Navarro strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Hideki Okajima replaces Josh Beckett.
Melvin Upton pops out to second baseman Nick Green.
Carl Crawford flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Evan Longoria grounds out, shortstop Julio Lugo to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Pat Burrell strikes out swinging.
Willy Aybar called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Ramon Ramirez replaces Hideki Okajima.
Ben Zobrist grounds out to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Pitching Change: Jonathan Papelbon replaces Ramon Ramirez.
Akinori Iwamura walks.
With Jason Bartlett batting, throwing error by Jonathan Papelbon on the pickoff attempt, Akinori Iwamura to 2nd.
Jason Bartlett singles on a line drive to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Akinori Iwamura to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Carlos Pena replaces Dioner Navarro.
Carlos Pena strikes out swinging. Jason Bartlett steals (7) 2nd base.
Melvin Upton strikes out swinging.
Carl Crawford strikes out swinging.
Jacoby Ellsbury flies out to right fielder Ben Zobrist.
Dustin Pedroia lines out to shortstop Jason Bartlett.
David Ortiz strikes out swinging.
Jason Bay doubles (7) on a fly ball to center fielder Melvin Upton.
Mike Lowell flies out to right fielder Ben Zobrist. Jason Bay to 3rd.
J. D. Drew reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by first baseman Willy Aybar. Jason Bay scores.
Jeff Bailey flies out to right fielder Ben Zobrist.
Jason Varitek called out on strikes.
Nick Green singles on a fly ball to left fielder Carl Crawford. Nick Green out at 2nd, left fielder Carl Crawford to second baseman Akinori Iwamura.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carl Crawford.
Dustin Pedroia grounds out, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Willy Aybar. Jacoby Ellsbury to 2nd.
David Ortiz walks.
Jason Bay strikes out swinging.
Mike Lowell called out on strikes.
Boston Red Sox second baseman Dustin Pedroia left the game due to an injured groin.
J. D. Drew called out on strikes.
Jeff Bailey doubles (2) on a fly ball to center fielder Melvin Upton.
Jason Varitek doubles (7) on a line drive to left fielder Carl Crawford. Jeff Bailey scores.
Nick Green singles on a fly ball to right fielder Ben Zobrist. Jason Varitek scores. Nick Green out at 2nd, right fielder Ben Zobrist to shortstop Jason Bartlett.
Jacoby Ellsbury grounds out to first baseman Willy Aybar.
Julio Lugo grounds out, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Willy Aybar.
David Ortiz pops out to third baseman Evan Longoria.
Jason Bay pops out to first baseman Willy Aybar in foul territory.
Mike Lowell singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Carl Crawford.
J. D. Drew strikes out swinging.
Jeff Bailey walks. Mike Lowell to 2nd.
Jason Varitek grounds into a force out, shortstop Jason Bartlett to second baseman Akinori Iwamura. Jeff Bailey out at 2nd.
Nick Green flies out to center fielder Melvin Upton.
Jacoby Ellsbury flies out to center fielder Melvin Upton.
Julio Lugo grounds out, second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Willy Aybar.
Pitching Change: Brian Shouse replaces Matt Garza.
David Ortiz doubles (10) on a fly ball to center fielder Melvin Upton.
Pitching Change: Dan Wheeler replaces Brian Shouse.
With Jason Bay batting, wild pitch by Dan Wheeler, David Ortiz to 3rd.
Jason Bay doubles (8) on a fly ball to left fielder Carl Crawford. David Ortiz scores.
Mike Lowell grounds out, pitcher Dan Wheeler to first baseman Willy Aybar. Jason Bay to 3rd.
Dan Wheeler intentionally walks J. Drew.
Jeff Bailey strikes out swinging.
Jason Varitek flies out to right fielder Ben Zobrist.
